directions: Purée 2 cups pineapple chunks, 1/4 cup rum, 2 tablespoons Cointreau, 1/2 tablespoon lime juice, 1/4 cup sugar, and 2 cups ice in a blender at high speed until very smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large pitcher, then make 2 more batches in same manner, transferring to pitcher. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 6 cups (1-inch) chunks cored peeled pineapple (labeled "extra sweet")
12 oz (3/4 cup) amber rum such as Bacardi
3 oz (6 tablespoons) Cointreau or other orange-flavored liqueur
title: Pineapple Rum Cocktails
